title: No-confidence motion: Speaker Om Birla not to preside till decision on oppn's notice
content: The Congress on Tuesday moved a no-confidence notice against Birla, accusing him of repeated partisan conduct during the ongoing Budget session. The party alleged that he denied leader of the opposition Rahul Gandhi the opportunity to speak and ordered the suspension of opposition MPs. Sources told news agency ANI that opposition MPs alleged "blatantly partisan" conduct and that leaders of Opposition parties were not allowed to speak.

title: 'This is the status of the book': Ex-army chief MM Naravane reacts to row over memoir
content: Former Army chief Manoj Mukund Naravane has backed his publisher, Penguin, regarding his unpublished memoir, "Four Stars of Destiny." The book's circulation has sparked a political storm, leading to an FIR and Lok Sabha disruptions after an excerpt was attempted to be quoted by Rahul Gandhi. Penguin stated that any circulating copies are unauthorized and infringe copyright.

title: Trump‚Äôs zero-tariff clause for B'desh: Will India‚Äôs textile exports lose edge?
content: The India-US trade framework was being seen as an important breakthrough that could improve access to America‚Äôs $118 billion textile and apparel import market. The US is already India‚Äôs largest destination for textile exports.

title: Google adds new AI risks to its annual report - here's what it reveals
content: Alphabet's latest financial report highlights new AI risks, including potential excess capacity from heavy infrastructure investment and increased costs from third-party leases. The company plans a $20 billion bond sale to finance its AI ambitions, with CEO Sundar Pichai citing compute capacity as a major concern amid surging demand for AI services like Gemini.

title: IND vs PAK: 'Going to Colombo a challenge' - Doeschate on why Pakistan have the edge
content: India say they were always mentally prepared to face Pakistan on February 15, with assistant coach Ryan ten Doeschate stressing off-field issues never affected preparations, though Pakistan may have a logistical edge in Colombo. Opener Abhishek Sharma missed training due to illness and could be rested, with Sanju Samson a possible replacement.

title: IndiGo says pilot strength adequate as DGCA‚Äôs temporary duty norm relaxations end
content: IndiGo assures stable operations as DGCA's temporary pilot duty norm relaxations end. Following significant flight disruptions and cancellations in early December, the airline faced regulatory scrutiny. The DGCA had granted exemptions until February 10 to aid stabilization, but pilot bodies emphasize safety over fatigue concerns.

title: Happy Promise Day 2026: Top 50 wishes, messages and quotes for your special someone
content: Promise Day arrives on February 11, encouraging genuine communication and effort in relationships. It offers a pause for honesty and reassurance, emphasizing presence and consistency over grand gestures. This day serves as a simple reminder to nurture connections amidst busy lives. It highlights that small, achievable promises build real trust and strengthen bonds.

title: Microsoft appoints its first 'Engineering Quality Head,' and here's why that matters
content: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella appointed Charlie Bell as the new head of engineering quality, a move occurring as AI-generated code increases alongside reported bugs. This comes amid challenges with Windows 11 reliability and underwhelming Copilot adoption, raising questions about the company's AI strategy and product quality.

title: ECI extends SIR in poll-bound Bengal by 2 weeks; final rolls on Feb 28
content: In a letter to the Chief Electoral Officer of West Bengal, the Election Commission said the decision was taken in compliance with the Supreme Court‚Äôs February 9 order. Earlier, the final voters‚Äô list was scheduled to be published on February 14, with elections to follow after completion of the exercise.

title: Goldman Sachs lifts India growth forecast, cuts CAD estimate after India-US trade deal
content: Goldman Sachs has boosted India's economic growth forecast for 2026 to 6.9% and reduced its current account deficit estimate to 0.8% of GDP. This positive revision follows the India-US trade deal, which lowers US tariffs on Indian exports. The brokerage also noted the Indian Rupee's recent strength, though further appreciation is unlikely, and expects interest rates to remain stable.

title: Elon Musk shares video claiming 'live-streamed from Antarctica using Starlink'
content: Elon Musk mistakenly claimed a Starlink-streamed video was from Antarctica, but X's community notes revealed it was actually filmed in Patagonia, South America. The footage, shared by a user, showed an ice cave. This incident follows Musk's recent $1.25 trillion merger of SpaceX and his AI startup, xAI.

title: When cosmic relationships turn toxic: How some stars feed on their companions
content: Cosmic relationships in space mirror human connections, with some stars locked in destructive, codependent partnerships. Binary systems featuring white dwarfs often exhibit this imbalance, where one star siphons material from its companion, leading to energetic outbursts like novae. Systems like EX Hydrae and HM Sagittae showcase these extreme interactions, where prolonged feeding can reshape space and prove fatal for one or both stars.

title: Rahul Gandhi didn't speak first on budget debate to avoid ‚Äòengineered disruptions': Report
content: Congress MP Rahul Gandhi will not begin the Union Budget debate today. He cited concerns over potential disruptions from the treasury benches. Gandhi is now expected to speak on Wednesday. The decision follows a notice by opposition parties to remove the Lok Sabha Speaker. Shashi Tharoor initiated the debate. Several opposition members have been suspended this session.

title: 'Made us sign an NDA': Bad Bunny‚Äôs Super Bowl halftime grass were actual people
content: Several performers, dressed as sugarcane grass, were hired for Bad Bunny‚Äôs Super Bowl halftime show. One of them, Andrew Athias revealed he earned $18.70 per hour. Applicants were to meet specific height and build requirements, had to carry a 40-pound costume, and undergo extensive rehearsals that lasted for 12 hours. A viral Instagram reel showcases the Super Bowl-day experience through a sugarcane performer‚Äôs eyes, impressing viewers who adored the performers‚Äô dedication.

title: Padraig Harrington and Caroline‚Äôs combined net worth in pro golf
content: Padraig Harrington, a celebrated Irish golfer with over 25 years of elite competition, boasts an estimated net worth of $40 million, largely from his significant career earnings and sponsorship deals. His career highlights include three major championship victories and consistent success on both the PGA Tour and PGA Tour Champions, solidifying his legacy as one of golf's greats.

title: Stefon Diggs hotel rumour fuels breakup talk with Cardi B
content: Rumors are swirling around Cardi B and Stefon Diggs after fans noticed they unfollowed each other following the Super Bowl. Speculation intensified when Cardi left the event early and reports surfaced alleging Diggs was seen with another woman in a hotel room hours after the loss. Neither has confirmed a breakup, but online chatter continues to grow.

title: Ranveer Singh receives extortion threat after firing outside Rohit Shetty‚Äôs house
content: Ranveer Singh has reportedly received a threat from an unidentified sender, as the underworld appears to be tightening its grip around Mumbai‚Äôs entertainment industry, days after a firing incident outside filmmaker Rohit Shetty‚Äôs residence.

title: No Abhishek in India's first training session in Delhi - here's why
content: India opener Abhishek Sharma missed training in New Delhi due to stomach illness, putting his availability for the Namibia match in doubt. He had a golden duck against the USA and did not field, with Sanju Samson replacing him. Mohammed Siraj said, ‚ÄúAbhishek Sharma has an upset tummy, that's why he didn't field. He will be back fine.‚Äù India may rest him ahead of the Pakistan clash, recalling Samson if needed.

title: Gold, silver rate today: Yellow metal extends rally; silver slips nearly 3%
content: Silver prices plummeted by nearly 3% to Rs 2.64 lakh per kg in Delhi on Tuesday, while gold saw a Rs 2,200 gain per 10 grams, reaching Rs 1.60 lakh. This divergence occurred amidst a firm US dollar and anticipation of key US economic data.  Traders are observing a consolidation phase in precious metals.

title: Travis Kelce reportedly felt awkward with Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds
content: As Taylor Swift deals with probably being called to court after her controversial text exchange with Blake Lively was made public, it seems Travis Kelce was never fond of their company. Just a few hours ago, an insider has claimed that Travis Kelce reportedly felt uncomfortable while hanging out with the Hollywood power couple and is now pretty concerned about Taylor Swift.

title: 120 oppn MPs move no-confidence against Om Birla - what is next
content: The Congress has filed a no-confidence motion against Lok Sabha Speaker Om Birla, citing partisan conduct during the Budget session. The opposition alleges denial of speaking time to Rahul Gandhi and suspension of MPs. This extraordinary step, supported by 120 MPs, aims to address perceived undemocratic practices in Parliament.

title: India needs $14.23tn investment in power sector by 2070 to meet net-zero goal: Niti Aayog
content: India needs a massive $14.23 trillion investment in its power sector by 2070 for a net-zero future, with renewables dominating generation.  Electricity's role in consumption will surge, requiring a 14-fold increase in installed capacity.  Decarbonizing transport and securing critical mineral supplies are also vital for achieving climate goals.

title: Still no India No. 1 Erigaisi as Norway Chess reveals new participant
content: Norway Chess has confirmed Alireza Firouzja for its 2026 event in Oslo, while India No. 1 Arjun Erigaisi is still not in the announced lineup. Firouzja, a former prodigy who became a GM at 14 and the youngest to reach 2800 rating, has twice played the Candidates and finished runner-up at Norway Chess before. India will be represented by world champion Gukesh and R Praggnanandhaa, with more names to be revealed.

title: Reducing China dependence: India eyes critical minerals deals with France, Brazil, Canada
content: India is actively pursuing agreements with Brazil, Canada, France, and the Netherlands to jointly explore, extract, and process critical minerals like lithium and rare earth elements. This strategic move aims to secure vital raw materials for the nation's energy transition and reduce dependence on China, which currently dominates global supply chains for these essential resources.

title: Tracy Scroggins‚Äô cause of death revealed as CTE battle highlights football risks
content: Former Detroit Lions defender Tracy Scroggins has died at 56. His family released a statement where they stated that he spent his retirement battling the effects of CTE, a brain disease linked to repeated head trauma, being the cause of his untimely demise.

title: 35% of under-5 kids are stunted in India: Doctor explains what‚Äôs failing
content: A staggering 35% of Indian children under five are stunted, a consequence of chronic undernutrition impacting development and future potential. Experts highlight that while programs exist, implementation gaps, poor sanitation, and inadequate maternal nutrition persist. Strengthening community-based counseling for the crucial first 1,000 days is urged as a vital step.

title: Govt sets 3-hour deadline for social media platforms to remove flagged AI deepfakes
content: New government rules now mandate clear labelling for all AI-generated content, including deepfakes and synthetic audio, starting February 20. Social media platforms must verify user declarations on AI content and embed traceable metadata.  Takedown timelines have been drastically reduced to as little as three hours for certain violations, with platforms also required to warn users about penalties.

title: Rajpal Yadav surrenders in Rs 9 crore cheque bounce case; look at his fees and net worth
content: Comedian Rajpal Yadav has made headlines again, this time for surrendering to Tihar Jail after the Delhi High Court refused to extend the timeline on a Rs 9 crore cheque bounce matter.

title: Redemption for Netherland's Bas de Leede at Kotla; buries 2023 ODI WC ghost
content: Bas de Leede delivered a match-winning all-round performance against Namibia in Delhi, a venue where he previously set an unwanted ODI record. His unbeaten 72 and two wickets secured Netherlands' first T20 World Cup win, erasing the memory of a tough outing against Australia in 2023.

title: 'My heart broke': Why a 5-year-old was not allowed to sit on a swing in famous park
content: A five-year-old girl, Inika, was denied a swing at a park due to her perceived disability, causing her distress. Inika, a survivor of severe brain injury, defied doctors' grim prognoses through her parents' unwavering dedication and therapy. Her experience highlights societal inclusivity challenges for children with differences.

title: Seahawks coach Mike Macdonald admits awkward Super Bowl moment on Jimmy Kimmel
content: Super Bowl LX winning coach Mike Macdonald shared his unreal Super Bowl LX victory over the New England Patriots experience on Jimmy Kimmel Live. The football coach discussed his calm demeanor towards players, his unique role calling defensive plays, and the genius acquisition of quarterback Sam Darnold from the Minnesota Vikings. Macdonald also mentioned the upcoming search for a new offensive coordinator following Klint Kubiak‚Äôs departure for the Tom Brady part owned Las Vegas Raiders.

title: LS Speaker removal bid: Why INDIA bloc ally TMC refused to sign oppn notice
content: Trinamool Congress leader Abhishek Banerjee stated his party will sign a no-confidence motion against Lok Sabha Speaker Om Birla, but only after the opposition first appeals to the Speaker with their grievances, including the suspension of eight Congress MPs. Banerjee emphasized giving the Speaker time to respond before proceeding with removal efforts.

title: Why Tusshar Kapoor‚Äôs real estate choices reflect a growing investor mindset in India
content: Actor Tusshar Kapoor revealed his preference for real estate investments over traditional glamour and market volatility. He highlighted practical housing choices, favouring affordable and ready-to-move-in properties, and expressed interest in emerging smart cities for future growth, reflecting a new urban investor mindset.

title: Stock market today: Which are the top 10 gainers and losers on NSE & BSE? Check list
content: Indian equity markets extended their winning streak for a third day, buoyed by positive global sentiment and hopes of a US-India trade deal. While the Sensex and Nifty both closed higher, profit-booking limited further gains. Investors are now keenly awaiting quarterly earnings reports for market direction.

title: World Record! Highest-ever stand helps NZ chase 174 inside 15.2 overs
content: New Zealand‚Äôs Tim Seifert and Finn Allen smashed an unbeaten 175-run opening stand to chase down UAE‚Äôs 173/6 with a 10-wicket win in just 15.2 overs. Seifert made 89* and Allen 84*, dominating UAE‚Äôs bowlers. Earlier, Muhammad Waseem (66 not out) and Alishan Sharafu (55) had lifted UAE to their highest T20 World Cup total, but NZ‚Äôs explosive chase sealed their second straight win.

title: 'Pakistan will be beaten again': Ex-Pak cricketer guarantees - Watch
content: Former Pakistan bowler Mohammad Asif warns the national team against the United States in their upcoming T20 World Cup 2026 match, predicting another upset. He recalls the dramatic Super Over loss in the 2024 edition, where USA secured a historic victory. Asif believes history could repeat itself, putting Pakistan's campaign at risk.

title: Quote of the day by Kohli: 'It's time for the next generation to take over'
content: Virat Kohli announced his T20I retirement after India‚Äôs seven-run win over South Africa in the 2024 T20 World Cup final, saying it was time for the next generation. He was Player of the Match for his 76 and finished with 4,188 T20I runs. India ended an 11-year ICC trophy drought with an unbeaten campaign, celebrated nationwide with major rewards and honours.

title: 10 teams, 12 quarterbacks, no great options: Sorting the lackluster NFL quarterback market
content: There are no surefire free agent QBs available this March, and the draft class has only one first-round lock. So what now for teams that might need a quarterback?

title: Minus Peterson, KU hands No. 1 Arizona first loss
content: Flory Bidunga had a double-double, and No. 9 Kansas defeated top-ranked and previously unbeaten Arizona 82-78 on Monday night.

title: Four tossed after brawl in Pistons-Hornets game
content: A fight broke out between the Pistons and Hornets on Monday night, leading to the ejections of Charlotte's Moussa Diabate and Miles Bridges and Detroit's Jalen Duren and Isaiah Stewart.

title: U.S. wins bronze, Shiffrin-Breezy 4th in team run
content: Although Mikaela Shiffrin finished fourth after Breezy Johnson gave her a first-run lead, the U.S. still won bronze in the team combined event Tuesday, as Austria won gold.

title: Canada women's hockey capt. Poulin out vs. U.S.
content: Canada women's hockey captain Marie-Philip Poulin has been ruled out Tuesday's preliminary round matchup against the U.S. at the Olympics.

title: Ukrainian fights for helmet despite armband OK
content: Ukrainian skeleton athlete Vladyslav Heraskevych wore the helmet commemorating athletes killed during the war with Russia during training runs Tuesday, after IOC said they'd allow an armband.

title: 49ers DL White shot in ankle in San Francisco
content: 49ers defensive lineman Keion White underwent surgery Monday after he was shot in the ankle in San Francisco hours after Super Bowl LX concluded.

title: Njoku confirms longtime Browns tenure is over
content: Impending free agent tight end David Njoku, who has played his first nine years in the NFL with the Browns, will not return to Cleveland in 2026.

content: On Tuesday at the Winter Olympics, the U.S. women's hockey team faces Canada, and skier Mikaela Shiffrin fell just short of a medal.

content: Right now, it's about looking beyond UNC's numbers and taking into account the context that has the Tar Heels as a 4-seed.

content: The ACC and Big 12 will have a say in the field's final teams. For now, the Last Four In all hail from the ACC.

content: Three years after an epic end to the World Baseball Classic, American stars are pitching in like never before.

title: Team USA figure skating costumes: 2026 Olympic designs and drama
content: A bull, a building or a matador -- will Team USA's figure skating style win gold at the 2026 Winter Games? Learn more about fashion on the ice now.

title: NASCAR descends on Daytona eager to move on from turbulent offseason, get back to racing
content: It was a heartbreaking offseason for much of NASCAR, and as the garage descends on Daytona, the stock car world is ready to refocus on racing.

content: Much to the irritation of some league insiders, the trade deadline was more than just a flurry of moves.

content: The Raiders hired Klint Kubiak. Here's what that means for Las Vegas, plus what's next in the offseason.

content: Drake Maye and the Patriots weren't able to do much in Super Bowl LX, but their future might still be bright.

content: Let's size up Seattle's defensive wrinkles, an explosive RB, great special teams and Sam Darnold's performance.

content: The QB isn't motivated to prove the haters wrong, but to prove people right. And on Sunday, he did just that.

title: Ranked: The top 25 manager jobs in soccer, from best to worst
content: Most of soccer's top coaching jobs will be vacant in the next year or so. Let's rank which jobs are the most -- and least -- attractive, from clubs to national teams.

title: Liverpool at a crossroads: Where it has gone wrong for Slot since Premier League title
content: It's been a rough season for Arne Slot and Liverpool -- but is it already too late for them to turn the tide?

title: UWCL playoff round preview: Can Arsenal maintain winning momentum?
content: The inaugural UWCL playoff round begins this week, with a host of big clubs -- including Arsenal -- fighting for a spot in the quarterfinals. Here's what you need to know about all four match-ups.

title: NFL playoffs top moments: From Caleb Williams' miracle TD to the Super Bowl MVPÔªø
content: Here's a look at the wild and woolly NFL postseason, from frigid temperatures to trick plays and Super Bowl MVPs.

content: Tristan H. Cockcroft gives newcomers tips on how to best use the tools available to them in ESPN's fantasy baseball game.

content: Every week in fantasy basketball, there are available players who can help fill holes in your roster. Here are the ones to add for the week ahead.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Madrid, Chelsea, Liverpool eye Junior Kroupi
content: Bournemouth forward Junior Kroupi is attracting attention from some of Europe's elite clubs. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: Congress-led Opposition moves no-confidence motion against Lok Sabha Speaker
content: Opposition parties led by the Congress on February 10 moved a no-confidence motion against Lok Sabha Speaker Om Birla, accusing him of partisan conduct amid repeated disruptions in the House.

title: BRS accuses State government of allowing A.P. draw excess Krishna water
content: BRS leader and former minister Harish Rao says A.P. has availed 80% water already against its ad hoc entitlement of 66%

title: Speaker to stay away from Lok Sabha proceedings till Opposition‚Äôs petition against him is disposed of
content: Parliamentary Affairs Minister Kiren Rijiju posts February 4 Lok Sabha footage, showing women Congress MPs near PM‚Äôs seat; says ‚Äúvery ugly scenes‚Äù were prevented by restraining BJP members

title: Students from Karnataka can practice as nurses in Kerala, says HC
content: Several BSc Nursing students from nursing colleges in Karnataka were being denied registration in Kerala

title: Soldier due for disability pension, if chronic disability was due to military service: Kerala HC
content: Court directs payment of disability pension arrears to B. Manikuttan, a native of Mavelikara who served as a Havildar in the Army

title: Naidu presses Centre for statutory backing to Amaravati, financial support
content: Chief Minister discusses Amaravati capital Bill, State finances and key issues with Union Home and Finance Ministers in New Delhi

title: Watch: India‚ÄìU.S. trade deal a surrender of reciprocity, says Tharoor
content: Congress MP Shashi Tharoor criticised the India‚ÄìU.S. interim trade agreement during the Lok Sabha Budget debate, calling it a pre-committed purchase pact rather than a fair trade deal.

title: Scientists showcase advances in health care, genetics and knowledge systems at research conference
content: A major highlight of the day at the National Research Conference being held in Thiruvananthapuram was a breakthrough in Alzheimer‚Äôs research that could transform early diagnosis for Kerala‚Äôs ageing population

title: T.N. officials prepare for upcoming Census 2027 activities
content: During the session, the critical nature of the exercise was emphasised upon and a roadmap of the essential action points to be prioritized by was provided

title: Adult male tiger set for reintroduction into wild
content: The expert committee says that the tiger was ‚Äòinnocent‚Äô as it did not attack any human being during its 53-day¬†sojourn in the four States; the historic operation, in which the tiger was tranquilised in the human settlement without causing any harm to it, is coined ‚ÄòStripes‚Äô

title: Pallikaranai Ramsar site land dispute: Madras High Court dismisses two PILs
content: The dismissal of the PIL petitions clears the legal hurdle in construction of high rise residential towers by Brigade Enterprises Limited

title: Handle Deeksha devotees with dignity at Srisailam, CM cautions officials
content: Chandrababu Naidu directs zero tolerance for lapses, orders daily planning and tighter crowd management as pilgrim rush is set to peak ahead of Mahasivaratri at the Srisailam temple

title: Devotees throng Gunadala Mary Matha Shrine to offer prayers
content: Devotees from Telangana, Tamil Nadu, Kerala and places across Andhra Pradesh attend the 102nd Utsavams

title:
IOCL biogas plant in Tirumala will be 
operational by May, says TTD Chairman
content: With a proposed capacity of 40 tonnes of biogas per day, the plant is projected to help TTD save around ‚Çπ1.52 crore annually, says B.R. Naidu

title: Embrace the spirit of people-friendly policing, SPC tells new SI recruits
content: Ravada A. Chandrasekhar urges officers to adapt to evolving crime patterns at Kerala Police Academy passing-out parade

title: Private hospitals express apprehensions about KCE Act
content: As registration begins, many smaller hospitals fear they may struggle to meet the new requirements under the Kerala Clinical Establishments Act. Kerala Private Hospitals‚Äô Association moves the SC against the High Court ruling, which  fully endorsed the Act.

title: Punjab Governor's Anti-Drug Yatra Triggers Row Over Opposition Participation
content: Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) Punjab spokesperson and MLA Kuldeep Singh Dhaliwal on Tuesday raised serious questions over Governor Gulab Chand Kataria's "anti-drug yatra."

title: Violence In Manipur Again, Houses Set Ablaze In Litan As Naga, Kukis Clash
content: Tension continued to grip the commercial town of Litan in Manipur's Ukhrul district, following clashes between Naga and Kuki communities.

title: Bangladesh To Give Rs 37 Lakh Aid To Family Of Lynching Victim Dipu Das
content: The Bangladesh government has announced it will provide financial assistance and support for the family of Dipu Chandra Das, who was lynched in Mymensingh district last year in December.

title: UP Woman Goes To Sleep, Family Finds 'Snake Skin' On Her Bed, No Trace Of Her
content: In a quiet village in Uttar Pradesh's Auraiya district, the disappearance of a young woman has sparked a wave of superstition, mystery, and a frantic police search.

title: Centre Grants Ex-Servicemen Status To Military Nursing Service Officers
content: The government has granted Ex-Servicemen status to officers of the Military Nursing Service (MNS), ending a long-standing disparity that had denied them access to several post-retirement benefits.

title: "100% Sure It's Conspiracy": Rohit Pawar On Uncle Ajit's Plane Crash Death
content: Rohit Pawar, leader of the Sharad Pawar faction of the NCP and grand nephew of the veteran politician, today said the death of his uncle and Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar on January 26 could have been the result of a conspiracy.

title: OpenAI Starts Testing Ads In Basic Version Of ChatGPT
content: OpenAI has begun placing ads in the basic versions of its ChatGPT chatbot, a bet that users will not mind the interruptions as the company seeks revenue as its costs soar.

title: Apple, Google Agree App Store Changes Under New UK Regulations
content: Apple and Google have agreed to make their mobile app stores fairer and more transparent for thousands of developers, Britain's antitrust regulator said on Tuesday, hailing it as important first steps in its tougher regime.

title: Two Killed In Bengal's Howrah After Iron Rod Falls From Building
content: Two people died after a heavy iron rod fell from a multi-storey building in West Bengal's Howrah city, police officials said on Tuesday.

title: Caught On Drone Cam: Parents Pass Chits To Students During Exam In Maharashtra
content: That cheating is rampant in exams in the country is no secret, but students being helped to do so by parents and relatives takes things up a notch.

title: J&K Intends To Fully Utilise Suspension Of Indus Water Treaty: Omar Abdullah
content: Jammu and Kashmir Chief Minister Omar Abdullah said on Tuesday that the union territory government plans to fully utilise the abeyance of the Indus Water Treaty (IWT) to implement various water infrastructure projects.

title: Rare Earth Corridor Is Strategic, But Execution Is Key: BMW India CEO
content: India's plan to develop a rare earth metals corridor spanning seven states is a positive step for the electric vehicle ecosystem, but its impact will be visible only over the long term, Hardeep Brar, President and CEO of BMW Group India said.

title: Kerala Revenue Official Arrested In 4.5 Crore Land Grab Case
content: The investigation into the multi-crore land grab case at a plush locality in the state capital city reached a crucial stage with the arrest of Sasthamangalom Sub-Registrar KS Lakshmi for allegedly facilitating the fraudulent transfer of a house.

title: Man Poses As IPS Officer, Dupes Woman Into Marrying Him In Rajasthan
content: A man was arrested for allegedly posing as an IPS officer and marrying a woman using false credentials in Rajasthan's Banswara district, police said on Tuesday.

title: Deadline To Block Illegal AI Content Cut From 36 To 3 Hours
content: The government has made it mandatory for social media platforms to place clear and prominent labels on AI-generated content.

title: Parents, 12-Year-Old Found Dead In Surat After Inhaling Toxic Fumes: Cops
content: A 12-year-old boy was among three members of a family found dead at their home in Surat on Tuesday after allegedly inhaling toxic fumes.

title: 'Has Huge Deposits': Probe Team Opposes Sabarimala Priest's Bail
content: The Kerala High Court-appointed Special Investigation Team (SIT) on Tuesday strongly opposed the bail plea of jailed Sabarimala temple tantri Kantarar Rajeevar before the Kollam Vigilance Court.

title: 2.4 Lakh Names Dropped as Assam Finalises Voter List
content: The Election Commission on Tuesday published the final voter list for Special Revision 2026 for 126 assembly constituencies in Assam, with over 2.49 crore voters.

title: French President To Visit India From February 17-19. What's On Agenda
content: French President Emmanuel Macron will visit India from February 17 to 19 and will discuss bilateral cooperation with Prime Minister Narendra Modi.

title: Om Birla To Not Attend Lok Sabha Until No-Trust Motion Decided: Sources
content: Taking a moral stand after the Opposition submitted a notice seeking to remove him from his post, Lok Sabha Speaker Om Birla has decided not to attend proceedings in the House until the motion is discussed and decided, sources said on Tuesday.

title: Political parties slam government over lathi charge on Siva devotees at Srisailam
content: Opposition and BJP leaders allege administrative failure, insensitivity towards pilgrims and breakdown of temple management, seek action against officials and political accountability

title: Crops damaged after irrigation canal breach in Vijayapura district
content: BJP leaders have demanded that the State government release compensation to farmers who suffered crop loss

title: Congress MP Mukul Wasnik seeks annual ‚ÄòState of Social Justice‚Äô report to strengthen constitutional commitments
content: Mr. Wasnik urged the government to come out with an annual report on social justice and table it in Parliament on the lines of the Economic Survey

title: SFI protest at Kerala University headquarters turns violent
content: Vice-Chancellor in-charge Mohanan Kunnummal declares existing University Union invalid, and initiates fresh Union elections

title: Pathanamthitta MP Anto Antony serves legal notice on CPI(M) leader
content: The dispute arose after Udayabhanu claimed that Antony improperly handled a ‚Çπ2.5 crore investment linked to the Sabarimala tantri following the collapse of a banking firm.

title: Ashwini Vaishnaw urged to revive Mysuru‚ÄìKushalnagar railway project

title: Murals at Ettumanur temple step out of shadows of time
content: In the initial phase, conservation efforts focussed on the Ananthasayanam mural on the inner wall beside the entrance, which covers an area of 142 sq ft. Other murals restored include Vetta Sastha Aghoramurthy, Vasthraparanam, Venugopalam, the twin Dwarapalakas and Veeralippattu. Together, they span 425 sq ft, with the conservation completed in six phases

title: See in photos how the Seahawks stopped the run and won the Super Bowl
content: The defense doesn't often take center stage in the NFL's championship game, but the  Seattle Seahawks ' unit took over in its  29-13 win  against the  New England Patriots  in Santa Clara, California Sunday night. The Patriots were scoreless in their 10 possessions of the game, tying the Colts (Super Bowl III) for the fourth-longest drought to begin a Super Bowl, according to Elias Sports Bureau. The Seahawks' defense held the Patriots to four first downs, 51 total yards, 2.0 yards per play and three sacks in the first half. We captured the plays that secured the Seahawks their second Super Bowl win.

title: Bad Bunny hosts wedding during Super Bowl LX halftime show
content: the couple featured in Bad Bunny's super bowl LX halftime performance was legally married . the couple was spotlighted several times during the show, beginning with a proposal early on . they got married surrounded by backup dancers .

title: Welcome to the offseason: What you need to know about key dates, biggest questions
content: a third of the NFL could be seeking a new quarterback this offseason . the 2026 draft is projected to be particularly light at the position, and no stars are looming in free agency . teams can begin u.s. games in the coming weeks .

title: LeBron calls out Lakers: We're not a title team
content: leBron James says the Lakers aren't a championship team after their loss to Oklahoma City . the lakers and Thunder relied on their supporting casts to play a Thunder-style physical game . "you want me to compare us to them?" he says .

title: Baseball is back! The stars, teams and themes we can't wait to see in spring training
content: the new york Mets capped an offseason overhaul with a trade for ace Freddy Peralta . the defending champion los Angeles Dodgers made the biggest splash when they inked no. 1 free agent Kyle Tucker to a four-year, $240 million deal .

title: Reunions, new faces and promotions: Tracking the Power 4 coordinator moves
content: college football's coordinator carousel is often about the next big thing, the name you don't know yet but will soon enough . Chad Morris is back as offensive coordinator at Clemson . he helped engineer the program's rise alongside Dabo Swinney from 2011 to 2014 .

title: 'Thank you Benito': Jalen Brunson, J.J. Watt react to Bad Bunny's Super Bowl LX performance on social media
content: Bad Bunny gave fans nearly 13 minutes of energetic entertainment . he opened the performance with "Tit Me Pregunt√≥" and transitioned to "Yo Perreo Sola" the sports world was well represented in the show .

title: Who will hoist the Heisman in 2026? A way-too-early look
content: mendoza led the Hoosiers to a perfect 13-0 regular-season record . he beat out quarterbacks Diego Pavia, Julian Sayin and Jeremiyah Love to take home the trophy . there's a whole new crop of Heisman Trophy candidates for 2026 .

title: Men's Bubble Watch: Belmont drops to a long shot
content: the 2026 men's NCAA tournament is rapidly approaching . we'll use a variety of metrics as guides, classifying teams based on how likely they are to make the field of 68 as one of the 37 at-large selections . the selection committee will evaluate a team's underlying potential .

title: Best moments: The Bay records first win of the season over Los Angeles
content: The Bay beat los angeles 11-5 in a high-stakes match on tuesday night . the match was the first of its kind in the playoffs for the first time . a scoreless start through the first two holes of the match swung in The Bay's favor .
